original_text: He cried out to the man of God who had come from Judah, “This is what the Lord says: ‘You have defied the word of the Lord and have not kept the command the Lord your God gave you.
korean_text: 그가 유다에서부터 온 하나님의 사람을 향하여 외쳐 이르되 여호와의 말씀에 네가 여호와의 말씀을 어기며 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 내리신 명령을 지키지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: He cried out to the man of God
This is what the Lord says:
You have defied the word of the Lord
and have not kept the command
the Lord your God gave you
